channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA Corporation -- GeForce Experience
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA Corporation -- GeForce Experience

item.title: CVE-2018-6265|2024-09-16T18:55:53.557Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- geforce%20experience
item.description: NVIDIA GeForce Experience contains a vulnerability in all versions prior to 3.16 during application installation on Windows 7 in elevated privilege mode, where a local user who initiates a browser session may obtain escalation of privileges on the browser.

item.title: CVE-2018-6262|2024-09-16T16:59:01.642Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- geforce%20experience
item.description: NVIDIA GeForce Experience prior to 3.15 contains a vulnerability when GameStream is enabled where limited sensitive user information may be available to users with system access, which may lead to information disclosure.
